personalInfo.name: Prasad Deshpande
personalInfo.title: Problem Solver | Technology & Gen AI Expert
aboutMe: I bring 17+ years of experience in Software Product Development, specializing in building reliable, scalable enterprise systems that deliver business value. Currently, I lead the design and development of a modern Quote-to-Cash (QTC) architecture, driving digital transformation through event-driven architecture and AI-powered automation.

I’m skilled in API development, Kafka, Spring Boot, Temporal workflow orchestration, automation, refactoring, and performance optimization. Leading a team of 8 engineers, I focus on delivering customer-centric solutions with operational excellence.

Previously, I played a key role in the Siemens Partner App Ecosystem, streamlining partner onboarding and application development. Architecting enterprise-wide AI-driven solutions for decision support and intelligent information retrieval, while actively exploring LLM-based automation for workflow optimization.
